title: Complete React Native & Expo Development
description: Master React Native and Expo to build professional cross-platform mobile applications. Learn navigation, state management with Redux, API integration, and deployment to App Store and Google Play.

title: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: Become a full stack developer with this comprehensive bootcamp covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and deployment strategies.

title: Python for Data Science & Machine Learning
description: Learn Python programming, data analysis with Pandas, data visualization, and machine learning algorithms. Build real-world ML models and deploy them.

title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification
description: Prepare for AWS Cloud Practitioner certification. Learn cloud concepts, AWS services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.

title: UI/UX Design Masterclass with Figma
description: Master UI/UX design principles, user research, wireframing, prototyping, and design systems using Figma. Create stunning mobile and web interfaces.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals & Ethical Hacking
description: Learn ethical hacking, penetration testing, network security, cryptography, and security best practices. Prepare for CEH certification.

title: Modern JavaScript - ES6 to ES2024
description: Deep dive into modern JavaScript including ES6+, async/await, promises, modules, destructuring, and latest ECMAScript features.

title: Flutter & Dart - Build iOS and Android Apps
description: Learn Flutter and Dart to build beautiful native mobile applications for iOS and Android with a single codebase. Includes Firebase integration.

title: DevOps Engineer - Docker, Kubernetes & CI/CD
description: Master DevOps tools and practices including Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, Terraform, and monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana.

title: Blockchain Development with Solidity
description: Learn blockchain technology and smart contract development using Solidity. Build DApps on Ethereum and deploy to mainnet.

title: Digital Marketing & SEO Mastery
description: Master digital marketing strategies, SEO, social media marketing, content marketing, email campaigns, and Google Analytics.

title: iOS App Development with Swift & SwiftUI
description: Build native iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI. Learn iOS design patterns, Core Data, networking, and App Store deployment.

title: TypeScript for React Developers
description: Master TypeScript and integrate it with React applications. Learn type safety, interfaces, generics, and advanced TypeScript patterns.

title: Artificial Intelligence & Deep Learning
description: Comprehensive AI course covering neural networks, deep learning, CNNs, RNNs, transformers, and GPT models using TensorFlow and PyTorch.

title: Game Development with Unity & C#
description: Create 2D and 3D games using Unity game engine and C#. Learn game physics, animations, UI, monetization, and publishing to app stores.
